name: Metal-Veined Strikes
summary: Metallic veins grow throughout your body, giving your unarmed attacks a metallic sheen.
description:
Metallic veins grow throughout your body, giving your unarmed attacks a metallic sheen. Choose either cold iron or silver. Your unarmed attacks are treated as the chosen type of metal.Traits

Oread: Oreads are planar scions descended from shaitans.
